__e: You're nothing but a big country boy, and you're chumpy as hell at times, and yet, by God, you do it.
I always said he was a lout and not worth all the attention everyone paid him.
You think it's redneck, and I never have to worry about seeing you at the in gate.
I'm not the bumpkin I was 2 years ago.
You think 'cause I'm some hick from small town who hasn't had any real crime, I'm not a real cop.
How do you know if you're a real hillbilly?
I'm in the middle of nowhere with a redneck that stinks like my ball sack, towing a car full of heroin that will put me away for two lifetimes.
There was some other kid there... more of a yokel than me, even... and he screamed, "man wasn't meant to fly!"
And beyond all that good Southern upbringing, Which I adore, I can see she's nobody's fool.
I never thought of you as a guy with the ass falling out of his...
So I came to look at her. But she is a fool and not worthy of our clan. She forgets that we are the rulers by acting against us impertinently.
Some redneck asshole and an even bigger asshole for a brother.
